SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT num, title, subtitle, content, writer, regdate, imagepath, showimage, viewcount FROM my_recipe
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '${content}'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '${writer}'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM my_recipe
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '${content}'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '${writer}'
SELECT mr.num, log.id, mr.title, mr.subTitle, mr.content, mr.writer, mr.regdate, mr.imagePath, mr.showImage, mr.viewCount FROM my_recipe mr, login log WHERE mr.writer(+) = log.id AND id = #{writer}
